DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE ( EQUIPMENT_TYPE varchar(15) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, WEIGHT_KG decimal(18,3) DEFAULT '0.000', ENABLED varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', PRIMARY KEY (EQUIPMENT_TYPE) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET ADD COLUMN EQUIPMENT_TYPE varchar(15) NULL NULL DEFAULT '' AFTER UPDATED_BY_USER_ID;
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET_HISTORY ADD COLUMN EQUIPMENT_TYPE varchar(15) NULL NULL DEFAULT '' AFTER DECISION;
UPDATE APP_PALLET s SET s.EQUIPMENT_TYPE = (SELECT m.EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM APP_MATERIAL m where m.MATERIAL = s.MATERIAL);
UPDATE APP_PALLET_HISTORY s SET s.EQUIPMENT_TYPE = (SELECT m.EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM APP_MATERIAL m where m.MATERIAL = s.MATERIAL);
ALTER TABLE `APP_DESPATCH` ADD COLUMN `TOTAL_EQUIPMENT` decimal(22, 0) NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `JOURNEY_REF`;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_pallet_expiry AS SELECT p.SSCC AS SSCC, p.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID, p.MATERIAL AS MATERIAL, p.BATCH_NUMBER AS BATCH_NUMBER, p.PROCESS_ORDER AS PROCESS_ORDER, p.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, p.UOM AS UOM, p.DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE AS DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE, p.STATUS AS STATUS, p.EAN AS EAN, p.VARIANT AS VARIANT, p.DESPATCH_NO AS DESPATCH_NO, p.CONFIRMED AS CONFIRMED, p.LAYERS AS LAYERS, p.SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE AS SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE, p.CUSTOMER_ID AS CUSTOMER_ID, p.MHN_NUMBER AS MHN_NUMBER, p.DECISION AS DECISION, b.EXPIRY_DATE AS EXPIRY_DATE, m.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, m.OLD_MATERIAL AS OLD_MATERIAL, c.CUSTOMER_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, c.PRINT_ON_LABEL AS PRINT_ON_LABEL, p.DATE_CREATED AS DATE_CREATED, p.CREATED_BY_USER_ID AS CREATED_BY_USER_ID, p.DATE_UPDATED AS DATE_UPDATED, p.UPDATED_BY_USER_ID AS UPDATED_BY_USER_ID, p.EQUIPMENT_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_TYPE, m.GROSS_WEIGHT AS GROSS_WEIGHT, m.NET_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT, m.WEIGHT_UOM AS WEIGHT_UOM, D.DATA AS PART_NO, E.DATA AS CASE_CONTENT, o.REQUIRED_RESOURCE AS REQUIRED_RESOURCE FROM (((((( app_pallet p LEFT JOIN app_material_batch b ON ((( b.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL ) AND ( b.BATCH_NUMBER = p.BATCH_NUMBER )))) LEFT JOIN app_material m ON (( m.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL ))) LEFT JOIN app_customer c ON (( c.CUSTOMER_ID = p.CUSTOMER_ID ))) LEFT JOIN app_process_order o ON (( o.PROCESS_ORDER = p.PROCESS_ORDER ))) LEFT JOIN app_material_customer_data D ON ((( D.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL ) AND ( D.CUSTOMER_ID = p.CUSTOMER_ID ) AND ( D.DATA_ID = 'PART_NO' )))) LEFT JOIN app_material_customer_data E ON ((( E.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL ) AND ( E.CUSTOMER_ID = p.CUSTOMER_ID ) AND ( E.DATA_ID = 'CASE_CONTENT' ))));

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_pallet_history AS SELECT app_pallet_history.TRANSACTION_REF AS TRANSACTION_REF, app_pallet_history.TRANSACTION_TYPE AS TRANSACTION_TYPE, app_pallet_history.TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE AS TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE, app_pallet_history.TRANSACTION_DATE AS TRANSACTION_DATE, app_pallet_history.SSCC AS SSCC, app_pallet_history.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID, app_pallet_history.MATERIAL AS MATERIAL, app_pallet_history.BATCH_NUMBER AS BATCH_NUMBER, app_pallet_history.PROCESS_ORDER AS PROCESS_ORDER, app_pallet_history.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, app_pallet_history.UOM AS UOM, app_pallet_history.DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE AS DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE, app_pallet_history.STATUS AS STATUS, app_pallet_history.EAN AS EAN, app_pallet_history.VARIANT AS VARIANT, app_pallet_history.DESPATCH_NO AS DESPATCH_NO, app_pallet_history.USER_ID AS USER_ID, app_pallet_history.CONFIRMED AS CONFIRMED, app_pallet_history.LAYERS AS LAYERS, app_pallet_history.SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE AS SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE, app_pallet_history.CUSTOMER_ID AS CUSTOMER_ID, app_pallet_history.MHN_NUMBER AS MHN_NUMBER, app_pallet_history.DECISION AS DECISION, app_pallet_history.EQUIPMENT_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM app_pallet_history;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW view_pallet_history_expiry AS SELECT p.TRANSACTION_REF AS TRANSACTION_REF, p.TRANSACTION_TYPE AS TRANSACTION_TYPE, p.TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE AS TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE, p.TRANSACTION_DATE AS TRANSACTION_DATE, p.SSCC AS SSCC, p.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID, p.MATERIAL AS MATERIAL, p.BATCH_NUMBER AS BATCH_NUMBER, p.PROCESS_ORDER AS PROCESS_ORDER, p.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, p.UOM AS UOM, p.DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE AS DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE, p.STATUS AS STATUS, p.EAN AS EAN, p.VARIANT AS VARIANT, p.DESPATCH_NO AS DESPATCH_NO, p.USER_ID AS USER_ID, p.CONFIRMED AS CONFIRMED, p.LAYERS AS LAYERS, p.SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE AS SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE, p.CUSTOMER_ID AS CUSTOMER_ID, p.MHN_NUMBER AS MHN_NUMBER, p.DECISION AS DECISION, p.EQUIPMENT_TYPE AS EQUIPMENT_TYPE, b.EXPIRY_DATE AS EXPIRY_DATE, m.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM (( app_pallet_history p LEFT JOIN app_material m ON (( m.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL ))) LEFT JOIN app_material_batch b ON ((( b.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL ) AND ( b.BATCH_NUMBER = p.BATCH_NUMBER ))));
